main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Hopewell Junction, New York on August 30, 1958 for approximately 15 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting was made by a civilian observing a single object,The object's flight path was noted to be northeast,The observer reported no physical evidence and stated that sightings were not reported until December 1968,The report is lacking in sufficient data for a detailed investigation,The description of the object is vague and lacks clear details.
witness description: a civilian who made the observation
